department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

description: This Addendum is issued based on agreement and will be the legal document between the parties (contractor and the government) at the time of the contract award.  In no event will the contractor release the personnel, equipment, resources, and supplies owned and or available under this GCSQ contract to any branch of the military in United States or Western Europe.
